name: Acorn One
description:
Oh no!

Spiders are attacking the Squirrel!

Pick up your acorn (with the space key) and throw it at the spiders (space key to throw).

GMTK Game Jam

This game was submitted for GMTK Game Jam 2019 with the theme "Only One".

The connection to the "Only One" theme in this game is that this is a Space Invaders type of game, but you have only one bullet (in this case an acorn) to attack the enemies with. You have to reuse this acorn to defeat the enemies.

Credits 
Programming / 3D Graphics – Oscar Friberg
2D Graphics / Sounds – Erik Friberg 
Music – Bike Rides  by The Green Orbs via Youtube’s Audio Library 
Additional Sounds - Explosion sound from Youtube’s Audio Library 
Game Engine – Unity
